intro: Epipactis phyllanthes subsp. fageticola, commonly known as the Fageticola helleborine, is a member of the orchid family, Orchidaceae. It is a terrestrial herb with a rosette of broad, dark green leaves that form a dense mat. The plant produces showy, greenish-yellow flowers with a distinctive lip, typical of many orchid species. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, often found in woodlands and along stream banks. This subspecies is characterized by its specific habitat preferences and morphological features that distinguish it from other members of the Epipactis genus.
